resources.string: Hello! Welcome to Karim Salem\'s TimeApp. Using this app, you can see your local time as compared to the times in four locations around the world where your friends and family may be. The initial locations are set to Bellevue, Denver, Gatineau, and Oldenburg. You could change them to any location you want (country, city or even a street address). Enjoy and don\'t forget to hire Karim Salem.
